title: Bridge Paediatrics Website
text:
Bridge Paediatrics is a research forum for Paediatric Postgraduate Doctors in Training (PGDiT) in Yorkshire and Humber, run by PGDiT


Check out the previous research training for clinician videos collated on the Previous Research Training Videos Tab


Get in touch via e-mail with:


bridge.paedsresearch.yh@gmail.com


Check back here for details of our next event:


Microsoft Teams: Research skills for paediatric doctors in training



Join the conversation with us on X via the handle:



BridgePaedsR_yh

title: Bridge Paediatrics Website
text:
Bridge Paediatrics Committee


Bridge Paediatrics is a research forum for Paediatric Postgraduate Doctors in Training (PGDiT) in Yorkshire and Humber, run by PGDiT. Get in touch via e-mail with:



bridge.paedsresearch.yh@gmail.com



Co-chair Dyanne Imo-Ivoke (ST4, Future Leaders Programme OOPE, East Yorkshire)


Dyanne is a paediatric trainee with an interest in neonatology and medical education






Co-chair - Verena Walsh (ST5, East Yorkshire)
